attributes.additional_details: The government should halt its exclusive negotiations with Delancey and Qatari Diar, and instead agree to hand the Olympic Park to the charitable Wellcome Foundation in accordance with its £1bn offer.   This would provide an early repayment of public investment and facilitate the development of a science and technology park, rather than breaking up the site and allowing it to be handled by an off-shore sovereign fund and a property company of a mere 15 years' standing.
